main.hero_description: An innovative web platform to guide Tunisian students after the Baccalaureate in making the best academic and professional choices.
main.creativity_desc: An intuitive interface, interactive tools and an engaging experience for students.
main.reliability_desc: A robust, secure system based on official data to ensure accurate advice.
main.evolution_desc: An evolving platform, regularly updated to accompany students in their journey.
main.feature1_desc: Calculate your orientation score based on your Baccalaureate, subjects and official thresholds.
main.feature2_desc: Explore public and private universities suited to your profile with detailed fees.
main.feature3_desc: Receive career advice based on artificial intelligence and your academic preferences.
main.feature4_desc: Get behavioral skills suggestions to excel in your future profession.
main.feature5_desc: Discover international institutions with filters by country, languages and specialties.
main.contact_subtitle: Do you have questions or need support? Write to us!
main.contact_success: Thank you for your message! We will get back to you as soon as possible.

footer.description: Supporting organizations through ethical and innovative digital solutions that drive meaningful transformation.
